body_html:
get_config is for Python state associated with the Layer. TensorFlow variables are saved separately, so the error is because there's no pickling defined for them.

Otherwise I assume this is the same issue as #21460 ? Or can you reproduce on a more recent build?
body_text:
get_config is for Python state associated with the Layer. TensorFlow variables are saved separately, so the error is because there's no pickling defined for them.
Otherwise I assume this is the same issue as #21460 ? Or can you reproduce on a more recent build?
body:
`get_config` is for Python state associated with the Layer. TensorFlow variables are saved separately, so the error is because there's no pickling defined for them.

Otherwise I assume this is the same issue as https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/21460 ? Or can you reproduce on a more recent build?
